Vous réduisez vos délais de recrutement et sécurisez l’acquisition de talents. Vos collaborateurs se sentent valorisés et voient leur avenir dans votre entreprise

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours streamline their HR processes and make data-driven decisions. I came across Cegid HR and was impressed with the work you're doing. Can you tell me a bit about your current data management setup?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Ah, yes. We're currently using a combination of Excel spreadsheets and some custom-built tools to manage our HR data. It's been working for us so far, but I can see how a more comprehensive solution could be beneficial. What makes DeepData AI unique?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Our AI-powered engine can process large amounts of data in real-time, providing insights that would be impossible to gather manually. We've seen companies reduce their data processing time by up to 70% and improve their decision-making capabilities significantly. I'd love to schedule a demo to show you how it works.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I'm not sure if we're in the market for a new tool right now. We've just implemented a new HR system and I'm not sure if our budget can accommodate another large purchase. Plus, I'd need to run it by our finance team to see if it's something we can even consider.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand budget concerns, but I'd argue that DeepData AI can actually help you save money in the long run by reducing manual data processing time and improving decision-making. As for integration, our solution is designed to be modular and can integrate with your existing HR system. We've worked with similar companies in the past and have seen great success.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the pitch, but I'm still not convinced. We're also exploring other options, including some of the bigger players in the market like SAP and Oracle. I'm not sure if DeepData AI can compete with their offerings, and I'd need to see some concrete case studies and references before I'd even consider moving forward.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand that you have options to consider, but I'd like to emphasize that DeepData AI is a more agile and customizable solution compared to the larger players. We've worked with companies similar to yours and have seen great success. I'd be happy to provide some case studies and references.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the offer, but I think we're going to have to pass on DeepData AI for now. As the CTO, I don't have the budget authority to approve new tools, and even if I did, I'm not convinced that it would be the best use of our resources. We're going to focus on optimizing our current systems and exploring other options that better fit our budget and strategic priorities. Thank you for reaching out, but I think we'll have to decline.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Authority
Feedback: The seller should have asked about the buyer's budget authority and involved the relevant decision-makers earlier in the conversation to increase the chances of a successful outcome. Sentiment: Neutral
